Solu is a web application meant for making it easy to find colleagues, meeting rooms and other resources in an office. It has a self service model without any authentication or permission checks, where anyone can find and update any resource's information.

Find

Type in some search terms to filter results. For example, "Doe" (without the quotes) matches John Doe and Jane Doe. Empty fields are not used.
